edu.jhu.cs.oose.montage.model

Class Newsfeed

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.jhu.cs.oose.montage.model.Newsfeed

  • public class Newsfeed
extends java.lang.Object
    Newsfeed class for Montage app. A Newsfeed is basically a list of media.
    Author:
    Gregory Kogut, Andrew Ding, Tiffany Ko, Da Lu, Anthony Lee
